```{r, fig.width=3, fig.height=3, results="asis"}

  cat('\n') 
  cat("###", i, "\n")

  ggplot2::ggplot(iris) +
    ggplot2::geom_point(ggplot2::aes(x=Sepal.Length, y=Petal.Length))
)

cat('\n')

}
```
